title: ISic001553. I.Sicily inscription 001553
body:
Facsimile Images

Ἰθιοκασία ἥρυ̣σα ἀγαθά

Apparatus criticus

Text checked against photograph in Vento; Gabrici: ΙΘΙΟΚΑΣΙΑ ΗΡΥΣΑ ΑΓΑΘΑ; Manni Piraino: Ἰθι[. .]ασία ἥρ[υ]σα ἀγαθά

translation

commentary

Photograph in Vento is excellent and it is possible to see traces of almost the entire text, as originally read by Gabrici.

bibliography
